description: This file implements an observability client for sending logs and metrics to a Monitoring & Logging service. It includes functions to send logs and metrics asynchronously, utilizing environment settings for configuration, and handles HTTP requests to the designated endpoints.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] _auth_headers()
methods.description: Generates authorization headers for the HTTP requests based on the API key in settings.

methods.name: str _now_iso()
methods.description: Returns the current UTC time formatted as an ISO 8601 string.

methods.name: None send_log(level: str, message: str, metadata: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)
methods.description: Sends a log message with specified level and optional metadata to the observability service asynchronously.

methods.name: None send_metric(name: str, metrics: Dict[str, Any], metadata: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)
methods.description: Sends a metric payload with specified name and metrics data to the observability service asynchronously.

ctags.name: send_log
ctags.pattern: /^async def send_log(level: str, message: str, metadata: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None) -> None:$/
ctags.signature: (level: str, message: str, metadata: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)

ctags.name: send_metric
ctags.pattern: /^async def send_metric(name: str, metrics: Dict[str, Any], metadata: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = N/
ctags.signature: (name: str, metrics: Dict[str, Any], metadata: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)
